block.p: American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Placed OF Scott Podsednik on the 15-day DL, retroactive to April 16. Recalled LHP Boone Logan from Charlotte (IL). LOS ANGELES ANGELS--Activated RHP Jered Weaver from the 15-day DL. Designated RHP Greg Jones for assignment. NEW YORK YANKEES--Recalled LHP Chase Wright from Trenton (EL). TEXAS RANGERS--Named Tim Hulett Sr. manager and Juan Carlos Pulido pitching coach for Spokane (NWL).

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Recalled OF Felix Pie from Iowa (PCL). Optioned RHP Angel Guzman to Iowa. CINCINNATI REDS--Reinstated SS Alex Gonzalez from the bereavement list. Designated INF Enrique Cruz for assignment. Sent RHP Jared Burton to Louisville (IL) on a rehabilitation assignment. Announced the retirement of Greg Rhodes, executive director of the Cincinnati Reds Hall of Fame and Museum, effective June 1, but will continue to serve as team historian.

LEAGUE--Suspended referee Joey Crawford indefinitely for improper conduct toward San Antonio F-C Tim Duncan during a game on April 15. MEMPHIS GRIZZLIES--Announced the resignation of Jerry West, director of basketball operations, effective July 1.
Women's N.B.A. CONNECTICUT SUN--Signed G Monique Martin and C Adrianne Davie.

BUFFALO BILLS--Agreed to terms with DL Tim Anderson and DL Anthony Hargrove. DALLAS COWBOYS--Agreed to terms with S Abram Elam and DT Montavious Stanley on one-year contracts. KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Re-signed DT James Reed to a three-year contract. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Signed DE Nick Eason.
CAROLINA HURRICANES--Signed Jim Rutherford, general manager, to a five-year contract.
Major League Soccer RED BULLS--Signed F Juan Pablo Angel.

CONFERENCE--Announced the resignation of Julie Byron, assistant commissioner/ women's basketball operations. AIR FORCE--Named Jeff Reynolds men's basketball coach. coach. ORAL ROBERTS--Agreed to terms with Scott Sutton, men's basketball coach, on a seven-year contract extension. SAINT LOUIS--Fired Brad Soderberg, men's basketball coach. SOUTH CAROLINA--Reinstated QB Stephen Garcia to the football team. SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA--Announced junior G-F Nick Young will make himself available for the NBA draft. TEMPLE--Named Michelle Young assistant director for athletic development.
